original_text: We are happy when we seem to be weak, if you become strong as a result. We pray that you will become completely as you should be.
korean_text: 우리가 약할 때에 너희가 강한 것을 기뻐하고 또 이것을 위하여 구하니 곧 너희가 온전하게 되는 것이라

sentences.original_text: We are happy when we seem to be weak
if you become strong as a result
We pray that you will become completely as you should be
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 완전히 되어야 할 모습이 되기를 기도합니다
